author: Giuseppe Gonzalez
description: This deep lurid reddy-brown cocktail won't be to everybody's taste but that's only to be expected with one-and-a-half shots of bitters. However, if you like cough candy then perhaps this cocktail is for you.
name: Trinidad Sour
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters
15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine stain into chilled glass
